formal_code:
import Mathlib
theorem ring_distributive_property (R : Type*) [Ring R] (a b c : R) : 
  a * (b - c) = a * b - a * c ∧ (b - c) * a = b * a - c * a := by
  constructor
  · -- Prove: a * (b - c) = a * b - a * c
    exact mul_sub_left_distrib a b c
  · -- Prove: (b - c) * a = b * a - c * a
    exact mul_sub_right_distrib b c a

nl_problem:
Let $p(x)$ be a polynomial of degree 4 such that $p(55) = p(83) = p(204) = p(232) = 8$ and $p(103) = 13.$  Find
\[p(1) - p(2) + p(3) - p(4) + \dots + p(285) - p(286).\]
formal_statement:
theorem polynomial_alternating_sum_evaluation (p : Polynomial ℝ) 
  (h_deg : Polynomial.natDegree p = 4)
  (h55 : p.eval 55 = 8)
  (h83 : p.eval 83 = 8)
  (h204 : p.eval 204 = 8)
  (h232 : p.eval 232 = 8)
  (h103 : p.eval 103 = 13) :
  let values := (List.range 286).map (fun i => p.eval (i + 1 : ℝ))
  values.alternatingSum = 0 :=
